---
name: Chimera
type: AV
speed: 30cm
armour: 5+

ff: 5+
special_rules:
  - transport
notes:
  |
    May transport two infantry units without _Jump Packs_ or _Mounted_. Armed with either a Multilaser, Twin Heavy Bolter or Heavy Flamer.

  -
    id: multilaser
    multiplier: 0–1
  -
    id: twin-heavy-bolter
    multiplier: 0–1
  -
    id: heavy-flamer
    multiplier: 0–1
  -
    id: heavy-bolter
